title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and command toolbox (pull, list, delete, benchmarking) written in Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK for Ollama (Android, Spring, Kotlin) with synchronous and async APIs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-chem
summary: Specialised Ollama Modelfile and dataset for chemical-name-aware LLM inference.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for macOS/Windows/Linux with keyboard-driven chat.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that reproducibly builds Ollama and common models; merged into nixpkgs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama pipelines in any CI (build, test, benchmark models).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that summarises notes, answers vault questions, and generates flashcards via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example spinning up autoscaling Ollama workers across a GPU cluster.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats, generates images, and moderates using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping Ollama's REST API with Tokio async client.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a sandboxed tool for Claude Desktop & friends.
